title: Pixel 3 XL / Android 10: sensitivity issue with bottom row of icons
content:
I upgraded my Pixel 3 XL to Android 10 yesterday and have activated the full gesture navigation. 

I am noticing that on the homescreen, the applications or folder that are in the lowest area aren't very responsive unless I either tap a few times or raise then close the launcher. 

Is there a sensitivity setting for this or could this be a possible bug? Is anyone else experiencing this? 

Android 10 on my Pixel XL and Pixel 2 XL do not seem to have this issue.
category: Homescreen and Launcher, Google Pixel 3 XL
